comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:2.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0.1
Build Identifier: 

Functional specs:

People who only want cards should not be able to designate their t-shirt size. Someone might think they can get a shirt.

A $5.00 donation should automatically remove the ability to select a t-shirt size. 

Main join bug : 649698

Reproducible: Always
comments.author: heather@textontechs.com
